thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 20 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: China will curb financial irregularities from the root - regulator

author: Reuters Editorial
title: China will curb financial irregularities from the root - regulator
text:
BEIJING (Reuters) - China’s banking and insurance regulator said in a statement on Friday it will curb financial irregularities from the root.
Reporting by Beijing Monitoring Desk
